thread.title: Love the treatments frustrated with the receptioni
thread.title_full: LaserAway reviewed by Love the treatments frustrated with the receptioni

author: Love the treatments frustrated with the receptioni
title: Love the treatments frustrated with the receptioni
text:
Some of the ladies are nicer than others.
There was a big storm, freeway was closed and roads were flooded. They called me while I was driving I walked in four minutes late and they proceeded to give me a bit of a lecture and I was told because I was so late I could not get my full treatement. The time before that upon arrival they cancelled my appt because their machines were down. The next appt they gave me was late at 8 pm I got there at 7;50 and the receptionist had the door locked and proceeded to tell me they were already closing with a bit of an cady attitude?!?!? Really!!! they gave me the appt.
